Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Madison
ShortDescription: 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Madison, Austin, Jackson and Central due to police activity near Central/Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Madison, Austin, Jackson and Central due to police activity near Central/Madison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 95th/Dan Ryan
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing due to police activity at 95th/Dan Ryan. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing due to police activity at 95th/Dan Ryan. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
